A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good Stuff: Luke is good\, including his jokes\, Luke's perfect \"Jedi-like\" duel with Kylo\, Yoda's cameo\, Kylo and Rey vs the guards is great.\n\nBad Stuff: The casino planet\, too many jokes\, Snoke's random death\, Rey is too powerful\, Poe is just an a-hole hot head that learns nothing\, Leia's force crap scene\, Rose sucks\, there's no politics and no first order backstory.
